Twelve radio programs are being broadcast each week from the campus
studio as the University of Michigan starts its 18th year of broad¬
casting, it is announced by Professor Waldo Abbot, director of the
University*s broadcasting service.
Five of the broadcasts are made over WJR, Detroit; four over CAR,
Pontiac; and three over WWJ, Detroit. This is the 18th year in which
